entries.title: Todo List for Brainstorming Tournaments
entries.content: Added todo items to kick off tournaments for key world-building areas. This leverages guidelines for complex problems. Next: Implement tournament mechanism (e.g., run_code for multi-agent sim, or create_tool).

entries.title: Starting Aurathia World-Building Project
entries.content: Initiating development of Aurathia, a high fantasy planet with magical industrial solarpunk revolution theme (1800-1900s vibes). Key elements: magical technology, artificers, corruption in the dark. Todo list focuses on tournaments for plot hooks, NPCs/factions, tech trees first. Will create tournaments for HIGH priority tasks and update journal frequently.
